nodes.text: Rogues Gallery was an ongoing feature in the Star Wars Gamer magazine. A number of issues featured around fourteen illustrations of individuals that could be used as character images in the Star Wars Roleplaying Game. Each issue contained a theme that was illustrated by a new artist.
Star Wars Gamer 3: Droids and the People Who Love Them
by Jeffery Carlisle (Some identified on Carlisle's website):
Star Wars Gamer 9: Pilots for Hire
